data.message: Really bashing our president, I just lost all respect for you.  Remember when you came on the scene people were bashing you.  You just turn into those people smh

replies.message: Sorry, do you not remember "Mosh"?
Chris live in truth, deep down you know that this Oompah Loompa ain't a presidents asshole.
Because ems music was never political. ...what kind of bandwagon fan is this guy? Remember the bush administration?
That's different bush didn't do s*** this guy  is actually getting the job done #MAGA
Fuck trump
Eminems music was always political, you were children who couldn't understand any of it. It's you, not Em. Good riddance, I'm sick and fucking tired of you shitbags repping Eminem.
What has Trump actually accomplished? Where are all the things he promised during his campaign? The only thing he's accomplished is further dividing the people and throwing up childish tweets
No I believe the media is further divided America.

Lol what music have you been listening too?  "You want me to fix up lyrics while our president gets his dick sucked?" Clinton.  "Laura and her husband to back off before I blow everything except Afghanistan on the map off." Bush.

Grow up
Alex Montagna Amen
Chris Ortiz Plus trump hated bush.
BUILD A WALL!
Chris Ortiz This will help cheer you up. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2AhGYo9TExU
Aaaaayyyyyeeee
https://media0.giphy.com/media/qMaBTVTRbyka4/giphy.gif

Chris Ortiz What job is that exactly?...racial division?---check,making the U.S. the most hated country on Earth right next to North Korea---check,Wasting taxpayer money on vacations he said he wouldn't take?---check,appointing the most useless and incompetent cabinet in U.S. history?---check,Having   big oil in his pockets and not having the balls to be environmentally responsible?---check,cutting the budgets to multiple scientific and educational programs?---check....I can do this all fucking day....tell me what job he has done...what has he actually done to "make America great again"?
Donald Trump can go to hell.
Nobody cares cupcake
Em has been speaking truth to power LONG before Trump was president. Where have you been?
This upsets you, a rapper doing what they do? But Trump acting like being President is a reality show is okay? Huh
President? You mean our puppet you dumb blind and retarded fuck? Fuck you and trump. Trump is gonna personally come to your ass when ww3 hits lmO
*Your President, Our Clown in Chief
Fuck Trump in his shit ass orange face.
